formElement.documentation: Short description of the work item.
formElement.label: Title:

formElement.documentation: Name or ID of a team project where the work item should be created.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Name or ID of a team project where the work item should be created.
formElement.label: Project name:

formElement.documentation: Name of the work item type.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Name of the work item type.
formElement.label: Type:

formElement.documentation: Priority for completing the work item, based on business goals. Parameter should contain a number
formElement.label: Priority:

formElement.documentation: The person currently assigned to the work item. The value can contain an email or a fully specified name of an assignee
formElement.label: Assign To:

formElement.documentation: Additional fields to be added as a JSON array. Please refer to the "Usage Example" at the procedure's help or Azure DevOps documentation for the examples.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Additional fields to be added as a JSON array. Please refer to the "Usage Example" at the procedure's help or Azure DevOps documentation for the examples.
formElement.label: Additional Fields:

formElement.documentation: JSON with the work items to create. All missing fields will be read from usual parameters. e.g. [{"Title": "Title for the first work item", "Type": "Task"}, {"Title": "Title for the second work item", "Priority": 2}]
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
This property should contain JSON array with the work items to create. All missing fields will be read from usual parameters.
Example: [{"Title": "Title for the first work item", "Type": "Task"}, {"Title": "Title for the second work item", "Priority": 2}]
formElement.label: Work Items JSON:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet. Property 'workItemIds' under the result property sheet will contain IDs for the created work items.
formElement.label: Result Property Sheet:
